sourcesContent:
<template>
  <event-poster> </event-poster>
</template>
<script>
import EventPoster from "./components/EventPoster.vue";
export default {
  components: {
    EventPoster,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      events: [],
      currentEvent: 0
    }
  },
  created() {
      this.getEvents();

      this.$bus.$on('navbarLinkActivated', (index) => {
          this.activePage = index;
      });
  },
  methods: {
    async getEvents() {
      let res = await fetch('events.json');
      let data = await res.json();

      this.events = data;
    }
  }
};
</script>
